Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.control

Class GUIControllerBridge

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.control.GUIControllerBridge
public class GUIControllerBridge extends Object
Convenience class that bridges the Controller's raw interface with one more usable by the GUI.

    • buildPlayCharacterMessage

      private static com.google.gson.JsonObject buildPlayCharacterMessage(long id, String username, CharacterType type, List<Map<String,String>> steps)
      Creates a new PLAY_CHARACTER message for the given username, game and character.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      id - the id of the game
      type - the character type
      steps - a list of invocation steps. Each step is a String-String map containing the invocation parameters
      Returns:
      a JsonObject representing the PLAY_CHARACTER message
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null
